name: Bruce Lan

projects.title: CRM Platform for Order and Client Management
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive CRM platform to optimize client interaction, order tracking, and financial data analysis

details.title: Order and Client Management
details.des: Designed tools for efficiently managing client profiles, tracking sales orders, and organizing communication in a centralized dashboard.

details.title: Order Assignment and Tracking
details.des: Implemented automated and manual order assignment features, ensuring seamless task delegation and real-time tracking of order progress.

details.title: Financial Data Analysis
details.des: Developed advanced stats and reporting tools to analyze financial order data, providing actionable insights for revenue and performance tracking.

details.title: User Authentication
details.des: ecured access using JSON Web Tokens (JWT), protecting client and order data during login, registration, and API access.

projects.title: Complete Travel Platform
projects.description: Designed and developed a full-featured travel platform that supports travel package browsing, flight and hotel booking, and order management.

details.title: Payment Integration
details.des: Integrated Stripe for secure and seamless payment processing, enabling efficient transaction handling across the platform.

details.title: API Integration
details.des: Managed the integration of over 100 third-party APIs, expanding the platform's services to offer diverse travel options.

details.title: User Authentication
details.des: Secured user authentication with JSON Web Tokens (JWT), protecting sensitive information during login, registration, and API access.

details.title: Performance Optimization
details.des: Enhanced platform performance through a custom caching strategy, improving system responsiveness and scalability.

details.title: Frontend Development
details.des: Built a responsive and user-friendly interface using React.js and Ant Design (Antd), ensuring an intuitive experience across various devices.

details.title: Backend Architecture
details.des: Developed a modular, scalable backend system using Express and Node.js, allowing for easy maintenance and future platform expansion.

projects.title: Portal
projects.description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of front-end features in a microservices architecture.

details.title: UI & Performance Refactoring
details.des: Refactored core front-end features to improve the user interface, enhance performance, and increase code readability.

details.title: Reusable Components
details.des: Developed reusable UI components for an internal UI library, ensuring consistent design and efficient development workflows.

details.title: GraphQL Integration
details.des: Collaborated in updating GraphQL queries with TypeScript, optimizing front-end data retrieval and display.

details.title: Payment Integration
details.des: Assisted in the front-end implementation for Stripe subscription checkout systems, contributing to seamless payment processing.

projects.title: Crypto Tracker
projects.description: Developed a frontend interface and data processing system for a cryptocurrency market data platform, utilizing modern technologies to deliver real-time insights.

details.title: Real-Time Data Integration
details.des: Pulled and processed real-time cryptocurrency market data from CoinGecko, storing the data in a MongoDB database for efficient access.

details.title: Backend Development
details.des: Built the backend using Express to handle data processing and API integration, ensuring smooth communication with the MongoDB database.

details.title: Frontend Development
details.des: Implemented the frontend using React.js and Ant Design, following modern standards to provide a responsive and user-friendly interface.

details.title: Data Display
details.des: Designed the user interface to dynamically display up-to-date crypto market information, giving users easy access to key data points.

projects.title: Tile Layer
projects.description: Utilizing Vue.js and TypeScript, this application streamlines the creation of game maps, enabling designers to focus on creativity rather than technical hurdles.

details.title: Intuitive Drag-and-Drop Interface
details.des: Designed a seamless user experience that allows game designers to easily place and manipulate assets within a 2D grid.

details.title: Dynamic Layer Management
details.des: Integrated a robust layer system that enables users to organize game elements hierarchically.

details.title: Custom Asset Integration
details.des: Developed a feature for importing custom assets, empowering designers to personalize their maps with unique graphics and sprites.

projects.title: Art Generator
projects.description: Utilized P5.js to generate abstract art in the browser using JavaScript.

details.title: User Experience
details.des: Implemented a user-friendly interface, providing a smooth and intuitive experience for users.

details.title: Performance Optimization
details.des: Optimized the performance of the art generation process, improving the response time and user experience.

aboutpara: Hello, I'm an experienced software engineer with over four years in developing scalable and secure applications. I work with TypeScript and modern frameworks like React and Node.js. My experience covers both front-end and back-end development, and I'm familiar with microservices architecture, cloud platforms such as AWS, and relational databases like PostgreSQL.ðŸ’» Outside of work, I enjoy reading books, and I recently finished The Great Gatsby.ðŸ“š I also have a fondness for sci-fi movies.ðŸŽ¬ I appreciate the stories they tell and the ideas they explore. I'm dedicated to building solutions that have a meaningful impact.

resume.description: While I'm dedicated to building scalable and secure applications, I also prioritize design and user experience, ensuring that my work is not only functional but also user-friendly. I am committed to making the development process smoother and more enjoyable for everyone involved.

experiences.position: Full Stack Developer at Family Holiday

experiences.bullets: Agile methodology, Web3, Payment Integration, UI Development

experiences.position: Web Designer at Mosaic North America
